pkgmetadata.longdescription: Algorithms to Compute 1d Water Levels along the German Federal Waterways Elbe and Rhine // An S4 class and several functions which utilize internally stored datasets and gauging data enable 1d water level interpolation. The S4 class (WaterLevelDataFrame) structures the computation and visualisation of 1d water level information along the German federal waterways Elbe and Rhine. 'hyd1d' delivers 1d water level data - extracted from the 'FLYS' database - and validated gauging data - extracted from the hydrological database 'HyDaBa' - package-internally. For computations near real time gauging data are queried externally from the 'PEGELONLINE REST API' https://pegelonline.wsv.de/webservice/dokuRestapi.
